memberdef.definition: rocblas_status rocblas_int const double rocblas_int incx
memberdef.name: incx

memberdef.type: rocblas_status rocblas_int const float rocblas_int rocblas_int *
memberdef.definition: rocblas_status rocblas_int const double rocblas_int rocblas_int * result
memberdef.name: result
memberdef.initializer: { return rocblas_iamaxmin<float>(handle, n, x, incx, result)

memberdef.argsstring: (rocblas_handle handle, rocblas_int n, const Ti *x, rocblas_int incx, rocblas_int *result)
memberdef.name: rocblas_iamaxmin

detaileddescription.para: iamaxmin finds the first index of the element of maximum magnitude of real vector x or the sum of magnitude of the real and imaginary parts of elements if x is a complex vector

parameterdescription.para: rocblas_handle. handle to the rocblas library context queue.
pointer storing vector x on the GPU.
rocblas_int specifies the increment for the elements of y.
index of max element. either on the host CPU or device GPU. return is 0 if n <= 0 or incx <= 0. Note that 1 based indexing (Fortran) is used, not 0 based indexing (C).
